buginformation.summary: closure compiler define annotation does not allow line split characters
buginformation.description: what steps will reproduce the problem create java script file with the followiing define string var constant quot some very long string name that want wrap quot quot and break using since don want quot quot introduce newline into the string quot run closure compiler the file see generate error the what the expected output what you see instead should work since the line assigning constant value the var please provide any additional information below removing the and making the string all one line does work correctly this issue was closed revision 474
